div.p: FHIR code system definition for country codes as they are described on https://www.ehealth.fgov.be/standards/kmehr/en/tables/fedict-country-codes
This code system https://www.ehealth.fgov.be/standards/fhir/CodeSystem/CD-FED-COUNTRY defines many codes, but they are not represented here

description.value: FHIR code system definition for country codes as they are described on https://www.ehealth.fgov.be/standards/kmehr/en/tables/fedict-country-codes
